name: Kelly, Appellant, v. Allegheny County Redevelopment Authority
name_abbreviation: Kelly v. Allegheny County Redevelopment Authority

judges: Before Bell, O. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and Eagen, JJ.
Mr. Justice O’Brien took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Kelly, Appellant, v. Allegheny County Redevelopment Authority.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed on opinion of Judge J. Frank McKenna, Jr., 26 Pa. D. & C. 2d 662.
Mr. Justice O’Brien took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: William Claney Smith, with him Charles F. Dean, for appellants.
Sylvan Libson, for Redevelopment Authority of Allegheny County, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Kelly, Appellant, v. Allegheny County Redevelopment Authority.
Argued March 15, 1962.
April 17, 1962:
Before Bell, O. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and Eagen, JJ.
William Claney Smith, with him Charles F. Dean, for appellants.
Sylvan Libson, for Redevelopment Authority of Allegheny County, appellee.
